    • Method Detail

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked​(MouseEvent e)
        If the mouse is double-clicked on a vertex, show a popup to request a new label for the vertex. The label becomes the value for the vertex key in the vertexLabelMap
        Specified by:
        mouseClicked in interface MouseListener
        Parameters:
        e - the event
